extendedInfo.description: iMissal has been granted an official Imprimatur from the Catholic Church and is approved for use!  In addition, iMissal is the only Catholic app of its kind that does not require WIFI/Cellular to access Mass Readings! You get access to Mass Readings for any day of the year. iMissal has been one of the top selling Catholic applications since its inception. Visit http://www.imissal.com for more details.-------------------------------------- See what others are saying about iMissal: "This is the best Catholic App I have downloaded so far..." - Scrello "Worth every penny! I am a very active Catholic, and this application is absolutely wonderful." - Spartagon "This is one cool app if your a geeky Catholic like myself." - tupelogeek.com "Worth more than charged..." - Lisurbi -------------------------------------- iMissal is Catholic Reference Application & Roman Missal for your Android, iPhone, iPad or iPod touch. If you are a life-long Catholic or new to the faith, this application is for you! Use iMissal to delve further into the Church's holy celebration. Here is what is included in iMissal: 1) A complete Missal: Liturgical Calendar: Full calendar displaying all of the liturgical seasons. The calendar is color coded based on liturgical season and shows Holy Days of Obligation, Solemnities, Major Feasts, Saints, etc. Calendar is currently available for years 1990 - 2050. Mass Readings: All the Mass Readings for every liturgical cycle (A,B,C,I,II) are included! This includes First Reading, Psalm, Second Reading, Alleluia, and Gospel for all Sunday and Weekday Masses. Reading text is always available for every day, no WIFI connection necessary. Uses translations officially approved for Mass in the U.S. Great resource for Lectors. ** The liturgical texts provided in iMissal are used with the permission of the Confraternity of Christian Doctrine and the International Committee on English in the Liturgy. They are the official texts approved for use in the dioceses of the United States by the U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops. Beware of other applications which use other translations and cost much more. Audio of the Mass Readings. Audio is only available for more recent dates (sliding window of aprx. 30 days). * WIFI connection recommended for optimal playback of audio files. Order of Mass: Ever wish you could follow along in Mass and have all the prayers, responses, etc. available. Now you can. Great for RCIA candidates that are new to the faith.  New Mass 3rd Edition is now included.Mass Videos: Cantcha, Inc. has teamed up with CatholicTV.com and now provides videos of the Mass for you to watch. * WIFI connection is required for optimal playback of videos. Videos are of high quality. 2) Our Daily Bread: Get a unique Bible verse for every day of the year displayed on beautiful backgrounds. * No WIFI connection is necessary. These verses have been hand selected from some of the most popular. Also included are some obscure verses you may have not seen before. * Save your favorite verses for later reference. * Search on any word across all verses to quickly find your favorites. * If you miss a day you can easily go back to view previous verses. * Mix it up by pushing the random button to get new verse each time. * Email any verse (w/o background) to your friends and family with a push of a button. 3) Prayers: Over 100 of the most popular Catholic prayers are included. Email your favorite prayers to your friends. 4) Catholic News FeedStay current on Catholic News and Events.Thousands of pages of scripture. Buying the equivalent text in your book store can cost a lot more than the price of this application. We have a lot of additional content planned for iMissal - stay tuned and God Bless.

reviews.title: Great Resource
reviews.comment: I love this app, I use it every day, and to prepare for the mass on sunday. This app has also been helpfull in teaching the meaning of the mass. Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for what it does
reviews.comment: I can see that this will be a very useful app for many of the faithful . Unfortunately the lack of collects and preface makes it severely limited in usefulness for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much appreciated
reviews.comment: Well organized, easy to use for personal prayer or for lector preparation anywhere without looking like \'church lady\' in public places. Also appreciate the church news for staying in touch with what is current.
reviews.author: Cathy Britton

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is the best app for catholics!! With the calendar, daily readings and prayers - how could you go wrong?  Worth the money by far and much better than any similar apps out there :)
reviews.author: Jo Wilson

reviews.title: I use it daily!
reviews.comment: I use the daily readings - DAILY!  A great Blessing to me when focusing on God\'s word. Easy to use and except for special, optional celebrations - always correct. I highly recommend iMissal!
reviews.author: Dennis Ryan

reviews.title: Great faith app!
reviews.comment: Love how I can follow this everyday! It has helped me grow in faith so much more. Wish there were songs on here that would make it exceptional
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Collects & Antiphons please
reviews.comment: You\'d have five stars if the entrance and communion Antiphons along with the collects were included or even available as an additional purchase.  The seasonal and festal prefaces would be a big help - i\'d pay for them. Fr. Bob L.  Sioux Falls, SD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Crimdo Love this app! I enjoy the daily meditation so much! Everything this app offers is wonderful!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app. The new way of mass is included. Could have a few hymns and language choices to earn five stars but so far it is worth the money. Turns my tab into a useful tool in church. Thank you continue upgrading. Gertrude J.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Love it. Works great, pics are awesome and peacefull Thx. Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT APP
reviews.comment: Great app.  I love all of it and use all of it!  No complaints....only praise!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daily Bread
reviews.comment: User friendly, accurate, convenient... highly recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful in daily prayers
reviews.comment: Awesome app for the everyday Catholic...need to say a prayer for any application? Find it here! Great app...hopefully it is okayed by the Roman Catholic church...that\'s why 4 stars
reviews.author: Rick Chaparro

reviews.title: GREAT!!!
reviews.comment: Worthwhile having Educational and interesting Knowledge enhancing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use it almost every day to read the daily mass readings.  On days I don\'t, its usually because I read directly from my Bible our hear the readings at mass.  I like the Saint of the day feature too, and the prayers.
reviews.author: John Bittner

reviews.title: iMissal
reviews.comment: I like and use this wonderful app instead of a missal. I would like to have included the entrance antiphon, the collect, and the communion prayers for a more complete version. I have also noted the absence of some alternate feast days or readings for the day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing daily collect and prayer after communion
reviews.comment: Its nice that it has the daily readings, but the mass parts are not specific to each day. There is no collect and no prayer after communion...not even for Sundays let alone daily mass. The mass parts are the same in this app no matter the day.   Unfortunately this app doesn\'t replace my soft back daily roman missal because it is incomplete.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: QBguy
reviews.comment: The best app of it\'s kind. Easy to navigate; very user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too many options the mass is.over by the time you find the right and going back take so you out of then app instead ofind back one page...very frustrating.\tRead title above this app needs debugging.
reviews.author: Stan Jarema

reviews.title: Very Neat
reviews.comment: Has a lot of good features. Very useful, I use it every day.  Suggestions for improvement: - Include Entrance & Communion antiphons - Include Prefaces - Ofer an option for Mass in Latin
reviews.author: Margarita Duncan Vanegas
